text: Yijian Liting’s eyes never rest. She is always aware of her enemy’s movements.
Hua Lanli’s archery skills are outstanding - drawing comparisons to the ancient hero Hou Yi, the Lord Archer himself.
Ma Yunlu selects only elite units of soldiers to fight alongside her. For these well-equipped and highly skilled troops, she spares no expense.
A childhood friend of Liu Bei, Jian Yong is carefree and informal, but also a superior orator.
An ambitious woman, whose reasons to marry Zhang Yan are as mysterious as herself.
